Reviews.Title: Arrived DOA - returned for refund
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: Ordered one as a Christmas gift, but it was essentially dead on arrival.  It would work while connected to a USB power source, but battery wouldn't hold a charge, so the snapshots were lost before we could get them to the computer.

Reviews.Title: cobra cam
Reviews.Author: Andrea Boswell
Reviews.Content: Its a piece of junk. I dont think we really ever got a pic out of it.Dont waste ur money

ProductInfo.Features:
1.3 Megapixel
LED flash light
Handy Carabiner design
ProductInfo.Name: COBRA DIGITAL DC1130RD 1.3 Megapixel Carabiner Digital Camera with LED Search Li
